# HMCharacteristicValueSwingMode.disabled

**Case**

The fan remains in a fixed position.

## Declaration

```swift
case disabled
```

## Movement Mode

- **HMCharacteristicValueSwingMode.enabled**: The fan swings back and forth.

items.description: The fan swings back and forth.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueSwingMode.enabled

title: HMCharacteristicValueSwingMode.disabled
